channel.title: CVE Feed for Foliovision -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Foliovision -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-0642|2024-08-05T03:35:48.652Z -- foliovision -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in FV Flowplayer Video Player 6.1.2 to 6.6.4 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-32955|2024-08-02T02:27:52.404Z -- foliovision -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Foliovision FV Flowplayer Video Player.This issue affects FV Flowplayer Video Player: from n/a through 7.5.43.7212.

item.title: CVE-2024-6338|2024-08-01T21:33:05.459Z -- foliovision -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player
item.description: The FV Flowplayer Video Player plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to time-based SQL Injection via the ‘exclude’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 7.5.46.7212 due to insufficient escaping on the user supplied parameter and lack of sufficient preparation on the existing SQL query. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to append additional SQL queries into already existing queries that can be used to extract sensitive information from the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-6338|2024-07-19T07:36:48.921Z -- foliovision -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player
item.description: The FV Flowplayer Video Player plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to time-based SQL Injection via the ‘exclude’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 7.5.46.7212 due to insufficient escaping on the user supplied parameter and lack of sufficient preparation on the existing SQL query. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to append additional SQL queries into already existing queries that can be used to extract sensitive information from the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-32078|2024-06-04T17:51:57.255Z -- foliovision -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in Foliovision FV Flowplayer Video Player.This issue affects FV Flowplayer Video Player: from n/a through 7.5.44.7212.

item.title: CVE-2024-32955|2024-04-24T07:05:43.260Z -- foliovision -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Foliovision FV Flowplayer Video Player.This issue affects FV Flowplayer Video Player: from n/a through 7.5.43.7212.

item.title: CVE-2024-35631|2024-06-07T17:19:16.514Z -- foliovision -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Foliovision FV Flowplayer Video Player allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects FV Flowplayer Video Player: from n/a through 7.5.45.7212.

item.title: CVE-2024-32955|2024-07-16T15:04:30.512Z -- foliovision -- fv%20flowplayer%20video%20player
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Foliovision FV Flowplayer Video Player.This issue affects FV Flowplayer Video Player: from n/a through 7.5.43.7212.

item.description: The FV Flowplayer Video Player plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to time-based SQL Injection via the ‘exclude’ parameter in all versions up to, and including, 7.5.46.7212 due to insufficient escaping on the user supplied parameter and lack of sufficient preparation on the existing SQL query. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to append additional SQL queries into already existing queries that can be used to extract sensitive information from the database.
